Version 2.0.0 - Real-time Progress via WebSocket Events

Major Feature: WebSocket Event Observers

Moodle now sends progress events to the SmartLearning backend for real-time WebSocket broadcast to connected users.

Supported Events

  • Completion: course_module_completion_updated
  • Quiz: attempt_submitted
  • Book: chapter_viewed
  • Lesson: page_viewed
  • SCORM: sco_launched, scoreraw_submitted
  • Assignment: submission_created, submission_graded

Progress Data Sent

  • cmid, courseid, userid, modtype
  • totalitems, completeditems, currentitem
  • score, maxscore, progresspercent
  • completionstate, timemodified

Configuration

Site Administration → Plugins → Local plugins → SmartMind Estratoos Plugin

  • SmartLearning Backend URL
  • SmartLearning API Key (leave empty to disable)

Previous Versions

  • v1.8.7: Calculate currentSlide from score.raw percentage
  • v1.8.6: Debug logging for SCORM element tracking
  • v1.8.5: Capture cmi.suspend_data for Articulate Storyline
